title: trans to california (lynchburg)
shortDescription:
we are leaving early on friday the 23rd of november for san diego califoria. anyone needing a ride give us a call. we can drop off anywhere along the way. 434 485 1507. 
we have a 15 passenger van that is in very good codition.

title: need ride (nashville tn to el paso tx)

title: ride to dc on wed 21st  (lynchburg to dc)
shortDescription:
looking for a ride to dc metro area (dc, nova) on/around wed the 21st of nov. the ride will be for two people, and we would pay a large portion of the gas. preferably during the daytime. 
also looking for a ride back to lynchburg on the following sun [...]

title: will pay for ride, dixie airport to sheetz (madison heights)
shortDescription: i'm tempoarily without a vehicle, and need a ride, thursdays, fridays, and saturdays, just 2.5 miles. i live off dixie airport and 130, and need to get to work, right across the street from sheetz. i will pay $5 to work each day. please call sandy. 4 [...]
